name: amkrtech
description: AMKRTech - Intelligent Financial Planning Tools and Calculators
author: AMKRTech Team

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix UI install && npm --prefix mid-tier install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n mid-tier,ui --kill-others "npm --prefix mid-tier run start:dev" "npm --prefix UI run start"
scripts.build:all: npm --prefix mid-tier run build && npm --prefix UI run build
scripts.lint:all: npm --prefix mid-tier run lint && npm --prefix UI run lint
scripts.clean:all: npm --prefix mid-tier run clean && npm --prefix UI run clean
